attributes.action: Increase the border security to the UK drastically
attributes.additional_details: It's quite clear that the background checks in place are clearly not sufficient enough, this can thej lead to all kinds of awful humans being given free access to the country, ISIS has already made some very bold claims which state that they have managed to get 'agents' as they call them which are willing to make the ultimate sacrifice to fight for their pathetic little cause, The way how they got these so called 'agents' into our country is through getting them to pose as refugees
attributes.background: It's clear that the background checks which are carried out upon a foreign nationals arrival to the country are just not thorough enough and need to do much deeper background checks than the ones that are currently in place.
